text: Darling Lili is a 1970 World War I romantic musical movie directed by Blake Edwards and starring Rock Hudson, Julie Andrews, Jeremy Kemp, Gloria Paul, Lance Percival, Michal Witney, Bernard Kay, Doreen Keogh, Carl Duering. It was nominated for 3 Academy Awards in 1971 and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1970 romance movies Category:1970 musical movies Category:American romance movies Category:American musical movies Category:Movies directed by Blake Edwards Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:World War I movies
title: Darling Lili
